alert.note: Alert for Matanuska Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 9:05PM AKST until December 27 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Freezing rain and Snow expected. Ice accumulations up to one quarter of an inch. Snow accumulations up to 3 inches, mainly northeast of Palmer. * WHERE...Matanuska Valley. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel will be hazardous. Ice accumulation may cause downed power lines and falling tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain will persist into the evening. Air temperatures may rise above freezing by this evening, but rainfall on snow and ice covered roads can be just as hazardous as freezing rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
